title: Untitled [elf blowing on a flower-horn]
marks:
Signature and Inscription

URC on back, in penci LLC, in black: [Richard Holzschuh]
description: elf with long hair and pointed ears, in profile from PL, blowing into a flower-horn; elf wears elaborate tunic, flowered cape and hat with very long feather on front, and holds a long spear; landscape with mushrooms and trees
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
